title: Chapter 967 - One Slash Determines Life And Death
body:
Chapter 967 - One Slash Determines Life And Death

The grand battle raged on.

Liu Changsheng was injured to begin with, and his predicament was already dire.

The short-haired woman was only in the late-stage Profound Illumination Realm, but she had an extreme abundance of combat experience. Her black scythe combined with the Laws of Heavenly Prayer were enormously threatening to Liu Changsheng.

Zhan Beiqi was currently facing a similar predicament.

However, Zhan Beiqi was evenly matched with his opponent. It would be difficult for him to suppress his opponent any time soon, much less kill him.

But the Thunderflame Demon Sovereign, Wang Chonglu, was the worst off.

Five experts of the Nine Heavens Pavilion attacked him together. He and his thirteen generals had an absolute numerical advantage on paper, but in practice, their opponents undoubtedly had the upper hand.

The reason was simple: Wang Chongluâ€™s wounds had similarly yet to heal, and his Thirteen Demon Generals were all in the Profound Illumination Realm. They were up against opponents of comparable cultivations, but the Jailers controlled the Laws of Heavenly Prayer. The generals were no match for them!

The battle had only just begun, but the Thirteen Demon...
original_title: Chapter 967 - One Slash Determines Life and Death
